subTitle: Rogovski – Where People and Flavors Meet
detail: Since 1951, Rogovski has been Japan’s first and most beloved Russian restaurant. It’s a place where families, friends, and colleagues come together to enjoy simple, heartfelt meals. Our dishes bring the warmth and comfort of home, blending the culinary traditions of Russia, Ukraine, Georgia, and beyond.
detail2: Rogovsky is a place where it feels good to spend time, share stories, and create new memories. We welcome every guest, whether it’s your first visit or you’re a regular.
